name: Curious Penguin Legend - Freedom Fall Of Valor Bungee Bird With True Umbrella Free
name_original: Curious Penguin Legend - Freedom Fall Of Valor Bungee Bird With True Umbrella Free
description:
The brave penguin is going to show the world that it can fly! Of course, it’s going to use some magic stuff!

Brave bird is an challenging multi-level action game.

Easy to learn but hard to master: tap to use the umbrella, and flick left and right to move. It’s Just that simple. However, every level requires nerves of steel and smart strategy.

Get ready and explore the world with the brave penguin!

Key-feature:
* Challenging levels
* Beautiful Pencil-sketch pictures
* Cute bird sounds
* Online leaderboard
